topics.body: I wish I had Tim Curry's voice. That slimy but sensual voice makes women everywhere want to slather his voice all over them. It would be a hell lot of fun reading out loud and maybe annoying my friends by laughing. If not, Tony Jay's voice would be awesome to have too, or maybe even Jeff Bennett's.
